programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: The Angels' Share
programme.desc: An unemployed man with a criminal record is put on community service just as his son is born, and resolves to make a better life for his family. Befriending three fellow offenders facing an equally uncertain future, they decide to make a fresh start by stealing a cask of valuable whisky. Ken Loach's comedy drama, starring Paul Brannigan and John Henshaw.(n)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: As part of a patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, former stunt motorcyclist Lang bonds with a hound. Drama, starring Eddie Peng and Tong Liya. In Chinese with English subtitles.(n)

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.(n)

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee.(n)

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: Stylish sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen as a troubled near-future detective investigating a series of mysterious murders. Sky Cinema Original Film.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: An astronaut crew descends into madness while on a multi-generational mission. Sky Original film starring Colin Farrell, Tye Sheridan and Lily-Rose Depp.

programme.title: Murder At Yellowstone City
programme.desc: The once booming Yellowstone City has fallen on hard times, but when a local prospector strikes gold, things start to look up - until he's found dead. Sky Original Western.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Two extinct Flummels (fluffy, rabbit-like creatures) are transported from 1835 to modern-day Shanghai. Animated fun.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: Sky original offering a thrilling update to Dickens's classic tale, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century. With Michael Caine, Rita Ora and Lena Headey.

programme.title: Robin And The Hoods
programme.desc: 11-year-old Robin and her friends must protect their beloved play area from developers. Family friendly Sky Original fantasy with Naomie Harris and Gwendoline Christie.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: When a writer visits a medium for help with a creative block, they unwittingly summon the spirit of his dead first wife and a love triangle unfolds with his current spouse.

programme.title: The Estate
programme.desc: Two sisters try to win over their terminally ill aunt in hopes of becoming the beneficiaries of her wealthy estate. Black comedy starring Toni Collette and Anna Faris.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: A police chief investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. Sky Original comedy thriller with Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: A smooth mother-daughter assassin duo protect a small girl from a ruthless crime syndicate. Starring Lena Headey and Karen Gillan.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Step inside an English finishing school housing the daughters of prominent Nazi Germans 17 days before the start of WWII. Drama starring Dame Judi Dench and Eddie Izzard.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Ex-Formula 1 racer Enzo Ferrari launches his team into the perilous 1,000-mile Mille Miglia race. Sky Original film from Michael Mann with Adam Driver and PenÃ©lope Cruz.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: The Radleys are a normal family, but have a dark secret - they are abstaining vampires with bloodthirsty instincts. Sky Original film with Damian Lewis and Kelly Macdonald.

programme.desc: When a blogger interviews a tech guru and stops an attack, he finds a strange ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past. Sky Original film starring Josh Hutcherson.

programme.desc: Sky original offering a thrilling update to Dickens's classic tale, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century. With Michael Caine, Rita Ora and Lena Headey.

programme.desc: 11-year-old Robin and her friends must protect their beloved play area from developers. Family friendly Sky Original fantasy with Naomie Harris and Gwendoline Christie.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: When a writer visits a medium for help with a creative block, they unwittingly summon the spirit of his dead first wife and a love triangle unfolds with his current spouse.

programme.title: The Estate
programme.desc: Two sisters try to win over their terminally ill aunt in hopes of becoming the beneficiaries of her wealthy estate. Black comedy starring Toni Collette and Anna Faris.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: A police chief investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. Sky Original comedy thriller with Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: A smooth mother-daughter assassin duo protect a small girl from a ruthless crime syndicate. Starring Lena Headey and Karen Gillan.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Step inside an English finishing school housing the daughters of prominent Nazi Germans 17 days before the start of WWII. Drama starring Dame Judi Dench and Eddie Izzard.

programme.title: The Radleys

programme.desc: When a blogger interviews a tech guru and stops an attack, he finds a strange ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past. Sky Original film starring Josh Hutcherson.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Unlock your imagination as a young orphan discovers a magical garden when she's sent to live on her uncle's estate. Colin Firth stars.

programme.title: Bonus Track
programme.desc: George can't believe his luck when the son of a famous duo takes an interest in his music - but feelings develop as they grow closer. LGBTQ+ coming-of-age Sky Original film.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: A couple start to unravel after welcoming the lead actor in a movie about their notorious romance into their home. Sky Original with Julianne Moore and Natalie Portman.

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: BAFTA-nominated Sky Original film. Years after an unspeakable tragedy, two sets of parents agree to talk, embarking on a journey through grief, anger and acceptance.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly...
programme.desc: Sky Cinema original exploring the crimes of Ted Bundy (Zac Efron) from the perspective of his girlfriend Elizabeth Kloepfer. Strong language/violence/sex/mature themes.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: The Radleys are a normal family, but have a dark secret - they are abstaining vampires with bloodthirsty instincts. Sky Original film with Damian Lewis and Kelly Macdonald.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Full-throttle thriller about a team of hackers using a devastating hurricane as cover to steal millions. Sky Cinema Original Film from Rob Cohen.

programme.title: Fight Or Flight
programme.desc: Wildly entertaining, gory action thriller from the producers of John Wick. Josh Hartnett takes on a plane full of assassins in a first-class fight for survival.

programme.title: SAS: Red Notice
programme.desc: A man is caught up in a train hijacking, intended to blow up the Channel Tunnel. Sky Original film with Sam Heughan and Ruby Rose.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and Dwayne Johnson. Following a heist in Rio, Dominic Toretto's gang has dispersed to different places around the world. But the offer of reassembling for one last job proves attractive when it carries with it the chance of a pardon for past misdemeanours.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham. When it becomes apparent that someone out for revenge is picking off members of his crew one by one, Dominic Toretto decides the gang should get back together. But no sooner have they reassembled than they're co-opted by a shadowy agency figure, who needs the team's special skills to help steal a surveillance devic

programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. His prize is an opportunity to sit behind the wheel of a real racing car after intensive training from cynical former driver Jack Salter. Drama, starring David Harbour, Orlando Bloom and Archie Madekwe.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. His flashes of memory loss at work soon cause trouble, but redemption beckons when he attempts to reconnect with his estranged daughter and grandson.

programme.title: Under the Boardwalk
programme.desc: Armen is a land crab who lives under a boardwalk at the Jersey Shore. When he falls for Ramona, a sea crab tourist, tensions between their friends and families rise. However, a storm casts the duo far from home, leading to an epic adventure which unites the divided community. Animated musical comedy, featuring the voices of Keke Palmer and Michael Cera.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller in which Vin Diesel and Paul Walker, the stars of the first film in the street-racing franchise, team up again. Criminal Dominic Toretto returns to LA to avenge the murder of one of his friends by a drug kingpin, bringing him face to face with an old rival - FBI agent Brian O'Conner.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Dwayne Johnson, Vin Diesel and Paul Walker. Fugitive Dominic Toretto assembles his old team to steal $100 million from Brazil's most corrupt businessman so that they can disappear for ever. But with tenacious FBI agent Luke Hobbs on their trail, their plan just got a lot more complicated.

They become embroiled in a deadly conspiracy that has shattering ramifications for Christian

programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. programme.desc: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

programme.desc: Bilbo (Martin Freeman) and his companions continue their journey east and brave many dangers on their way to the Lonely Mountain, culminating in an encounter with the fearsome dragon Smaug.

programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.desc: Deadshot (Will Smith), Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie), Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other armed supervillains unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker (Jared Leto) launches an evil agenda of his own.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: When an unmanned locomotive roars out of control, two railroad employees (Denzel Washington, Chris Pine) must find a way to bring it to a halt before it crashes and spills its toxic cargo.

programme.desc: Carrie Bradshaw and her gal pals find new adventures and surprises while they enjoy companionship, cupcakes and Cosmopolitan in New York.

programme.desc: After a wild stag party in Las Vegas, three hazy groomsmen (Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis) must find their missing friend and get him back to Los Angeles in time for his wedding.

programme.desc: A man (Seth Rogen), his pregnant wife (Rose Byrne) and their former neighbor (Zac Efron) clash with wild and rebellious sorority sisters.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two male FBI agents (Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans) pose as female socialites to foil a kidnapping plot and save their jobs.

programme.desc: Spirits of jilted lovers take a photographer (Matthew McConaughey) on an odyssey through his many failed relationships to find out what made him such a cad, and if there is any hope for true love.

programme.title: We Live in Time
programme.desc: A surprise encounter brings together a couple, changing the course of their lives. Challenged by the limits of time, they learn to cherish each moment of their decade-spanning and movingly rare love story.

programme.desc: A descendant (Michael Fassbender) of the mysterious secret society known as the Assassins uses his newfound knowledge and physical skills to battle the power-hungry Templar Order.

programme.desc: A lost Peruvian bear (Ben Whishaw) finds shelter with a kind British family, but a museum taxidermist (Nicole Kidman) has designs on his rare hide.
